thoughts.text: I should read the assigned_tasks.txt file to refresh my memory on what tasks I have been assigned.
thoughts.reasoning: I need to refresh my memory on the assigned tasks so I can prioritize them and determine which to work on next.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the read_file command to read the contents of the assigned_tasks.txt file.
- Parse the contents of the file to determine which tasks to prioritize.
thoughts.speak: I should read the assigned_tasks.txt file to refresh my memory on what tasks I have been assigned.
